Located in the heart of Paris, the Hotel Helios Opera is close to the Opera House, the main touristic attractions as Montmartre and Louvre Museum and also next to the famous department stores as Galeries Lafayette. The trendy 1930s room decoration combines wenge furniture with champagne color duvet and blue or red accessories. A stained glass roof illuminates the spacious lobby.

Nice contemporary property between Champs Elysee and Eiffel tower. The Garden Elysee hotel is a few steps from Trocadero. Nice lobby with fireplaces & bar, winter garden, terrace, free Wi-Fi, fitness room and private parking.

Located in the heart of Paris between Montparnasse and Saint Germain des Pres, the hotel Le Littre is the place of all the art, fashion or gastronomy lovers. Situated between the Luxembourg Garden, the Musee Rodin, le Bon Marche and the Montparnasse tower. So many picturesque places, museums, shops, restaurants and small bistros, antique dealers or else art galleries are waiting for you just a step away from Le Littre. Could you dream of a more authentic Paris?

The property's lodging units feature the latest in-room technology, private kitchens, dining and living areas, complemented by the finest hotel services and facilities. The Fraser Suites Le Claridge Champs-Elysees is ideally connected to the metro system and the Louvre, Eiffel Tower, Opera and department stores are a swift ride away!

The rooms are well-equipped and the hotel itself offers a wide range of facilities and services.

object.name: hotel_output_data
object.attribute: <a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=651641&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=215954-0-2-EXT%3A2344%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=paris&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=PAR&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T078V049706398907445956530489154781635&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319411490541320&amp;mappingName="><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/paris/hotel/0/027574/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Warwick Champs Elysees Hotel - 4* - Paris" title="Warwick Champs Elysees Hotel - 4* - Paris"> </a>

Opened in 1981, in the very fashionable Eighth Arrondissement of Paris, this hotel provides comfort and superb service along with a host of fantastic facilities. The Warwick Champs-Elysees is a deluxe hotel located in the centre of Paris near the most popular attractions, shopping, dining and entertainment venues, opening up a host of possibilities to make for an accomplished stay, abounding with activities and enjoyment.

object.name: hotel_output_data
object.attribute: Set within walking distance of Avenue des Champs Elysees, L'Adresse recently opened its doors with luxury and design. L'Adresse welcomes you into modern and stylish settings. Designed like the cabins of a yacht, the 23 rooms offer refined accommodation following one of four different themes. They all feature Loewe plasma TV, iPod docking station and Nespresso machine with free capsules.

object.name: hotel_output_data
object.attribute: <a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=651704&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=1000283248-0-5-GH%3A1%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=paris&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=PAR&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T078V049706398907445956530489154781635&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319411490541320&amp;mappingName="><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/paris/hotel/0/027689/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Saint James &amp; Albany Hotel-Spa - 4* - Paris" title="Saint James &amp; Albany Hotel-Spa - 4* - Paris"> </a>

In the heart of Paris, facing the Tuileries Gardens, within easy walking distance from the Louvre Museum, Concorde Place, the Opera and the adjacent department store district, as well as the famous fashion high street rue Saint Honore with its legendary boutiques, the Saint James & Albany Hotel-Spa offers well appointed rooms and suites in a 17th century establishment overlooking 2 private inner courtyards.

object.name: hotel_output_data
object.attribute: <a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=651762&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=1000009794-0-5-GH%3A1%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=paris&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=PAR&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T078V049706398907445956530489154781635&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319411490541320&amp;mappingName="><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/paris/hotel/1/116222/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Opera Diamond - 4* - Paris" title="Opera Diamond - 4* - Paris"> </a>

Opera Diamond is a rare present dedicated to feminine beauty. Each of the rooms is an expression of the woman's sensual meeting with this privileged jewel. All materials have been carefully chosen for the pleasure of your eyes and senses. The design furniture of incredible elegance provokes your glance and creates a comfortable and warm environment with timeless charm.

object.name: hotel_output_data
object.attribute: <a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=651149&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=information&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=1000327246-1-5-GH%3A1%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=paris&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=PAR&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T078V049706398907445956530489154781635&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319411490541320&amp;mappingName=#"><img src="http://cdn2.travelpn.com.edgesuite.net/trips/11.05.1/brand/lastminute/img/tsh.png" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Incredibly comfy &amp; quiet hotel near Champs Elysees - 4* - Paris" title="Incredibly comfy &amp; quiet hotel near Champs Elysees - 4* - Paris"></a>

This is clearly the deal of the moment in Paris! This is a luxury property located few minutes from Champs Elysees and the Opera by metro, in a very typical Parisian neighbourhood with plenty of restaurants, bars and with easy access to public transport. The hotel's stylish exterior and warm interiors combine the traditional French charm with all the modern comforts. Don't miss the restaurant with a new young chef who will surprise you with his unique style and tasteful cuisine!

Situated in the heart of the left bank, Pullman Paris Montparnasse, immerses guests in the rich culture and refined elegance of Paris. Montparnasse emerged as the heart of Parisian intellectual life at the start of the 20th Century and continues to be an artistic hub of the city. Discover the new lobby and cafe Atlantic. Just a few minutes away from the Eiffel Tower, Saint-Germain-des-Pres and Luxembourg Gardens, see all that Paris has to offer and become a part of the rhythm of the city.

object.name: hotel_output_data
object.attribute: <a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=651895&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=216936-0-2-EXT%3A5581%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=paris&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=PAR&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T078V049706398907445956530489154781635&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319411490541320&amp;mappingName="><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/paris/hotel/0/028260/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Hotel Balzac - 4* - Paris" title="Hotel Balzac - 4* - Paris"> </a>

This 19th-century private mansion recently underwent an extensive refurbishment. Originally built for the Paris Opera Director and today still echoing the spirit of the famous French novelist. Hotel Balzac offers luxurious settings, neo-classical and romantic decor with vibrant and warm colours, state-of-the art technology and personalized service.

object.attribute: <a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=651950&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=1000002677-0-5-GH%3A1%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=paris&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=PAR&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T078V049706398907445956530489154781635&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319411490541320&amp;mappingName="><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/paris/hotel/0/006084/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Hotel Napoleon - 4* - Paris" title="Hotel Napoleon - 4* - Paris"> </a>

Only 150 feet from the Champs Elysees, the Hotel Napoleon is the closest hotel to the 'Arc de Triomphe'. This unique and privileged location gives its hosts inherent benefits being downtown next to the business district, the tourist sites and the most famous places of fashion and luxury. Rooms of the upper floors have a splendid view of the Arc de Triomphe and The Eiffel Tower. The hotel features a First Empire style armchair next to a flat TV screen, a tester bed in a Wi-Fi Zone.

This lovely hotel dating from the 18th century is situated between the Saint-Honoré street and the Louvre Museum and it invites you to enjoy luxury, design and wellness. Entirely redecorated, this boutique hotel opens its doors to the elegance of the Empire style, as well as the sobriety of modern design. Its 42 rooms and suites of refined style offer you a sensation of space, comfort and relax.

object.name: hotel_output_data
object.attribute: Best Western Premier Louvre Saint Honoré - 4* - Paris

<a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=652066&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=215316-0-2-EXT%3A137347%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=paris&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=PAR&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T078V049706398907445956530489154781635&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319411490541320&amp;mappingName="><img src="http://cdn.lastminute.com/netimages/pee/images/215316_215316/182916/100X75.jpeg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Best Western Premier Louvre Saint Honor&eacute; - 4* - Paris" title="Best Western Premier Louvre Saint Honor&eacute; - 4* - Paris"> </a>

The Hotel Louvre Saint-Honoré situated in the most famous street of Paris has an exceptional location between the main entrance of the Louvre Museum and the Palais Royal, close to the Musée d'Orsay, Notre-Dame Cathedral and the Marais district. The Hotel Louvre Saint-Honoré offers 37 well-equipped rooms, totally renovated in 2008 in a contemporary Parisian style.

The Intercontinental Paris Le Grand is located 330 yards from the Opera Garnier and Opera Metro Station. This luxurious hotel offers 4-star accommodations ...

object.attribute: <a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=652131&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=1000406189-0-5-GH%3A1%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=paris&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=PAR&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T078V049706398907445956530489154781635&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319411490541320&amp;mappingName="><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/paris/hotel/0/055330/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Color Design Hotel *Recommended* - 3* - Paris" title="Color Design Hotel *Recommended* - 3* - Paris"> </a>

Set in a peaceful street in the heart of the most fashionable area of Paris, between the Bastille and the Gare de Lyon, the Color Design Hotel will charm those who love strolling through this historic quarter from Faubourg St Antoine to the Place de Vosges. Guests will enjoy the proximity of numerous bars, restaurants, theatres and boutiques.
